A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not as great as critics have labelled it. Far too many plot holes\, forced humour and repetition. This film feels like a carbon copy of The Empire Strikes Back. The character of Rose and her plot are unnecessary and forced. The only bright spot is the magnificent performance of Kylo Ren by Adam Driver\, who perfectly encapsulates a Star Wars villain. Sure\, the CGI was good but isn't it always these days? The Star Wars franchise needs to be seriously refreshed.
